      • givePowerToConsumer

        public static long givePowerToConsumer(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity consumer,
                                       long power,
                                       boolean simulated)
        Offers power to the Tesla Consumer.
        Parameters:
        power - The amount of power to offer.
        simulated - Whether or not this is being called as part of a simulation. Simulations are used to get information without affecting the Tesla Producer.
        Returns:
        The amount of power that the consumer accepts.

      • getStoredPowerInHolder

        public static long getStoredPowerInHolder(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity holder)
        Gets the amount of Tesla power stored being stored.
        Returns:
        The amount of Tesla power being stored.

      • getCapacityPowerInHolder

        public static long getCapacityPowerInHolder(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity holder)
        Gets the maximum amount of Tesla power that can be held.
        Returns:
        The maximum amount of Tesla power that can be held.

      • takePowerFromProducer

        public static long takePowerFromProducer(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity producer,
                                         long power,
                                         boolean simulated)
        Requests an amount of power from the Tesla Producer.
        Parameters:
        power - The amount of power to request.
        simulated - Whether or not this is being called as part of a simulation. Simulations are used to get information without affecting the Tesla Producer.
        Returns:
        The amount of power that the Tesla Producer will give.
